definition: Jiufen (or Jioufen or Chiufen), mountainside town in north Taiwan, former gold mining town, used as the setting for two well-known movies
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: No pains, a harvest, a certain.
sentences.chinese: 九份耕耘一份收穫，一定。

sentences.english: Judges chose nine finalists in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月時，選出最終的九份建議。

sentences.english: Judgers chose 9 final lists finalists in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月評選出最終的九份建議。

sentences.english: Can you divide the apples into nine?
sentences.chinese: 你能把這些蘋果分成九份嗎？

sentences.english: They just visited the popular tourist destination of Chiu fen outside Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛參觀了臺北郊外的熱門旅遊度假勝地九份。

definition: Jinguashi, town in Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, noted for its historic gold and copper mines, used as a prisoner-of-war camp by the Japanese (1942-1945)
Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])

Fenchihu, town in Chiayi County, Taiwan
